course.subject: IEDA
course.name: Stochastic Models in Operations Research
course.description: Poisson processes, renewal processes, Markov processes. Fundamental concepts and applications of these stochastic processes demonstrated through examples in queueing, inventory and reliability models.

reviews.author: ricernta
reviews.comment_content: This course teaches some stochastic models, which are relatively basic.
reviews.comment_teaching: The teaching is very detailed and the teacher will answer students' questions carefully.The classroom is very small and the windows cannot be opened, which makes people very irritated.
reviews.comment_grading: I got A+. The questions in the midterm exam are relatively straightforward, basically applying formulas and known conclusions learned in class. The final exam questions take even more time to understand.
reviews.comment_workload: Basically, you just need to understand all the slides.It is necessary to buy a book because you can only bring books and not other things during the exam.
